messages.agent_message: Would you like to create a new account?
What account type would you like to create?
messages.user_message: I want to create a retirement fund account for my son.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Which account would you like to select for this task?
messages.user_message: I want to use savings for this.

messages.agent_message: Ok! I just created a retirement fund account and transferred starter funds into it from savings.
Would you like to send any funds to a contact today?
Ok. How much money do you want to send and to who?
Which account would you like to use?
All done! I just e-transferred 5000 to Nancy from chequing.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Ok! I won't pay off your outstanding bills today.
Are you waiting for funds from any of your contacts?
How much money would you like to request and from who?
messages.user_message: Please request my contact Bob to send the 5000 they owe.

messages.agent_message: Ok, I'm requesting a payment of 5000 from Bob. I will let you know when the transfer goes through.
Would you like to transfer funds between accounts now?
All done. Have a nice day!
